meta.title: Product Details
meta.description: RPMI 1640 is widely used for suspension and adherent mammalian cell culture. It contains the reducing agent glutathione and elevated vitamins, supporting lymphocytes, hybridomas, and various tumor cell lines.

product.name: RPMI 1640 Cell Culture Medium
product.intro: RPMI 1640 stands out due to the presence of glutathione and higher vitamin concentrations compared with many other media. It supports a broad range of cell types including lymphocytes, hybridomas, and tumor cell lines.
